experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Built an interactive sales analytics dashboard (Power BI, Python, Excel) to visualize key KPIs: profit, orders, net sales, and units sold.Performed RFM customer segmentation and created actionable customer cohorts (Champions, Loyal, General) to support targeted marketing.Analyzed seller and product performance; surfaced top brands and SKUs to guide inventory and promotional decisions.Implemented forecasting for future sales and automated reporting to streamline business planning and review.Cleaned, transformed, and merged sales, customer, and product datasets to support accurate visualizations and analysis.
